original_text: And when she pressed him hard with her words day after day, and urged him, his soul was vexed to death.
korean_text: 날마다 그 말로 그를 재촉하여 조르매 삼손의 마음이 번뇌하여 죽을 지경이라

sentences.original_text: And when she pressed him hard with her words
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 말로 그를 강하게 압박할 때

sentences.original_text: his soul was vexed to death
